title: How the Supreme Court emboldened Democrats in California and elsewhere redrawing US House maps
description: The Supreme Court’s endorsement of how Texas Republicans redrew the state’s congressional map is offering hope to California Democrats as they prepare to defend their map in court this month – and emboldening other states to move ahead.

title: Texas Couple Who Vanished on the Way Home from Thanksgiving Dinner Found Dead in New Mexico
description: A Texas couple was found dead inside their car in New Mexico after vanishing on their way home from Thanksgiving festivities, Us Weekly confirmed. In a statement, investigators in Texas' Carson County said Linda and Gary Lightfoot, 81 and 82, respectively, were reported missing on November 30 when they failed to return to their home

title: BYU’s 11-1 run checks boxes for Big 12 title game run vs. Texas Tech
description: Few, if any, believed back in August that No. 11 BYU would race to an 11-1 season and face No. 5 Texas Tech in the Big 12 title game in AT&T Stadium in Arlington, Texas, on Dec. 6.  BYU outscored UCF 41-7 after trailing 14-0 Saturday at LaVell Edwards Stadium to finish the regular season 11-1 with an 8-1 Big 12 record.

title: Texas attorney general Ken Paxton urging state schools not to sign CSC’s participation agreement

title: First SpaceX booster for upgraded Starship fails during test in Texas
description: WASHINGTON (Reuters) -A towering first-stage booster for an upgraded version of SpaceX's Starship rocket suffered a predawn testing failure in Texas on ​Friday, potentially complicating the company's push to prove the rocket's moon-landing abilities ‌for NASA, according to observers who captured it on video. Elon Musk's SpaceX had rolled the stainless steel booster out to ‌a testing pad on Thursday at the company's Starbase rocket facilities, saying it intended to test its redesigned propellant
